verses.text:
\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*. O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; for \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.  +  r 106.1  t Praise…: Heb. Hallelujah *

Who can \w utter|strong="H4448"\w* the mighty \w acts|strong="H1369"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? \add who\add* can shew \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* all his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*?

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* they that \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \add and\add* he that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* at all \w times|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with the \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* \add that thou bearest unto\add* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: O \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* me with thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*;

That I may \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* of thy \w chosen|strong="H0972"\w*, that I may \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in the \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* of thy \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, that I may \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* with thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.
We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* with our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, we have committed \w iniquity|strong="H5753"\w*, we have done \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*.

Our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w understood|strong="H7919"\w* not thy \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; they \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* not the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thy \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w*; but \w provoked|strong="H4784"\w* \add him\add* at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \add even\add* at the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.
Nevertheless he \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* them for his \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, that he might make his mighty \w power|strong="H1369"\w* to be \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.

He \w rebuked|strong="H1605"\w* the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* also, and it was dried \w up|strong="H2717"\w*: so he \w led|strong="H3212"\w* them through the \w depths|strong="H8415"\w*, as through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And he \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* them from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of him that \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \add them\add*, and \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* them from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.
And the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*: there was not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them \w left|strong="H3498"\w*.
Then \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* they his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; they \w sang|strong="H7891"\w* his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

They \w soon|strong="H4116"\w* \w forgat|strong="H7911"\w* his \w works|strong="H4639"\w*; they \w waited|strong="H2442"\w* not for his \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*:\f + \fr 106.13 \ft They soon…: Heb. They made haste, they forgat\f*

But \w lusted|strong="H0183"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H8378"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H3452"\w*.\f + \fr 106.14 \ft lusted…: Heb. lusted a lust\f*
And he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them their \w request|strong="H7596"\w*; but \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w leanness|strong="H7332"\w* into their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

They \w envied|strong="H7065"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* also in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \add and\add* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w saint|strong="H6918"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* and swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w company|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*.
And a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w* in their \w company|strong="H5712"\w*; the \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* burned \w up|strong="H3857"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
They \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the molten \w image|strong="H4541"\w*.

Thus they \w changed|strong="H4171"\w* their \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* into the \w similitude|strong="H8403"\w* of an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* \w grass|strong="H6212"\w*.
They \w forgat|strong="H7911"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* their \w saviour|strong="H3467"\w*, which had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* great \w things|strong="H1419"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;

Wondrous \w works|strong="H6381"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w*, \add and\add* terrible \w things|strong="H3372"\w* by the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

Therefore he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* that he would \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* them, had \w not|strong="H3884"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* his \w chosen|strong="H0972"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him in the \w breach|strong="H6556"\w*, to turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* his \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, lest he should \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \add them\add*.

Yea, they \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* the \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, they \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* not his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*:\f + \fr 106.24 \ft the pleasant…: Heb. a land of desire\f*
But \w murmured|strong="H7279"\w* in their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, \add and\add* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Therefore he lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against them, to \w overthrow|strong="H5307"\w* them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*:\f + \fr 106.26 \ft to overthrow: Heb. to make them fall\f*

To \w overthrow|strong="H5307"\w* their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* also among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and to \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* them in the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 106.27 \ft To overthrow: Heb. To make them fall\f*
They \w joined|strong="H6775"\w* themselves also unto \w Baal-peor|strong="H1187"\w*, and \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.
Thus they provoked \add him\add* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with their \w inventions|strong="H4611"\w*: and the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* brake \w in|strong="H6555"\w* upon them.
Then stood \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, and executed \w judgment|strong="H6419"\w*: and \add so\add* the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* was \w stayed|strong="H6113"\w*.

And that was \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* unto him for \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* unto \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.

They \w angered|strong="H7107"\w* \add him\add* also at the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w strife|strong="H4808"\w*, so that it went \w ill|strong="H3415"\w* with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* for their sakes:
Because they \w provoked|strong="H4784"\w* his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, so that he spake \w unadvisedly|strong="H0981"\w* with his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.
They did not \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, concerning whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* them:
But were \w mingled|strong="H6148"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w learned|strong="H3925"\w* their \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.
And they \w served|strong="H5647"\w* their \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*: which were a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* unto them.
Yea, they \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* unto \w devils|strong="H7700"\w*,

And \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \add even\add* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and of their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, whom they \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*: and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* was \w polluted|strong="H2610"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.
Thus were they \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* with their own \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, and went a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* with their own \w inventions|strong="H4611"\w*.

Therefore was the \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, insomuch that he \w abhorred|strong="H8581"\w* his own \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.
And he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*; and they that \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* them \w ruled|strong="H4910"\w* over them.
Their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* also \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* them, and they were brought into \w subjection|strong="H3665"\w* under their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* did he \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them; but they \w provoked|strong="H4784"\w* \add him\add* with their \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, and were brought \w low|strong="H4355"\w* for their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 106.43 \ft brought…: or, impoverished, or, weakened\f*
Nevertheless he \w regarded|strong="H7200"\w* their \w affliction|strong="H6862"\w*, when he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* their \w cry|strong="H7440"\w*:

And he \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* for them his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* according to the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w*.
He \w made|strong="H5414"\w* them also to be \w pitied|strong="H7356"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* all those that carried them \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*.

\w Save|strong="H3467"\w* us, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* us from among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, to give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \add and\add* to \w triumph|strong="H7623"\w* in thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* to \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*: and let all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*.  +  r 106.48  t Praise…: Heb. Hallelujah *
